name: Racing Demon
description:
A fast-paced card game for up to four people. Each player plays a hand of solitaire but sharing their ace piles. It's a race to see who can play the most cards before either player goes "Demon". Play matches of first to 100 points or best of five hands.

Racing Demon can also be played solo to brush up on your skills before playing against your friends.

Note that in solo mode you are playing a single hand with no opponents (i.e. the app does not currently support playing against AI opponents).
